personalDetails.name: Esha Awasthi
personalDetails.title: I'm a Full Stack Developer
personalDetails.aboutMe: I am Esha Awasthi, Full Stack Developer from Pune, India. I have rich experience in web application development and customization, also I am good at Agile.

skillSet.title: Full Stack Development
skillSet.desc: Experienced in technologies such as Angular, HTML5 , CSS3, Javascript, Bootstrap, Spring Boot Services, PostgreSQL, Git, Visual Studio, Micorsoft.

skillSet.title: Project Management
skillSet.desc: I could handle projects along with interacting with clients/ Business Analyst for requirments. Ability to handle Agile Projects along with Deployment Activities

skillSet.title: Team Management
skillSet.desc: Ability to manage and work in a big team with Agile methodologies. Experienced in mentoring freshers and giving them KT and support as when required.
